using cadence analysis can help you stabilize cadence interval and save strength
support collection of cadence data from SpeedX Leopard, Mustang and some other models only
not connect to heart rate device yet
connecting to heart rate device can detect your physical status, and using analysis function to improve training effect
only support Apple Watch, SpeedX Leopard, Mustang and some other models to connect to external heart rate device for data collection

R1 level is suitable for beginners, continually maintaining cadence of 60~70 for training can rapidly make you be familiar with riding tempo, and lay down a good foundation for advancing riding capability.

R2 level is suitable for the users who have a certain athletics ability, maintaining cadence of 71~80 for training can gradually make you be familiar with riding tempo and rapidly improve your riding capability.

R3 level is suitable for the users who have some riding experiences and a preliminary understanding of cadence\'s function, hope to improve riding capability by using cadence. Maintaining cadence of 81~90 for training can develop nice riding habits and improve riding capability dramatically.

R4 level is suitable for the users who have relatively rich experiences and knowledge of cadence. Maintaining the optimal cadence of 91~100 for training can bring you the optimal comfort and maximum output power.
R5 level is suitable for experienced users who know their own athletics state. Maintaining cadence of 101~110 to meet training requirements of racing, slope climbing and so on.
Rx level is suitable for highly experienced users who have special requirements of cadence training. SPEEDX SMART CONTROL will not provide you with gear ratio recommendation if you select this.
